title: Merton Labour councillor quits over Israel-Gaza posts
description: A councillor in south London who was suspended by the Labour Party over her comments on the Israel-Gaza conflict has resigned from the party. Councillor Caroline Charles said she was "kicked out" for calling for a "ceasefire now" on social media.

title: Durham Council spent £1.2m on Levelling Up Fund bids

title: Falling by the Waugh-side - former journalist fails to clinch chance to be MP
description: From Winston Churchill to Boris Johnson, Michael Foot to Michael Gove and now husband and wife Ed Balls and Yvette Cooper, punditry to parliament is a well-trodden path.

title: Caribbean nation seeks slavery reparations from British brewer Greene King

title: Album reviews: The Smile, Saxon, Frank Carter & The Rattlesnakes and NewDad
description: More worrying for Radiohead fans are the lyrics. Thom sings: ‘And when the end has come, maybe you can’t, maybe you can’t be arsed for half a million…’ So, is The Smile a labour of love for Yorke and Greenwood or an escape hatch? Only time will tell.

title: Why the first Labour Prime Minister and former MP for Seaham still causes controversy
